item.title: Centos Stream and Kubernetes 1.20.0v
item.author: rwalt@pm.me (Ryan W. Walter)
item.description: Centos Stream Really isnt that bad I recently decided to deploy CentOS Stream due to the Recent announcment from both Redhat on their new focus and Kubernetes on their deprication of the Dockershim. I decided to use ContainerD with Kubernetes 1.20.0V. CentOS Stream was installed with minimal install.
